name: Song of Morus: Laments On the Brine
name_original: Song of Morus: Laments On the Brine
description:
It's a small 3-axis bullet-hell shooting game focusing on bossfight battle between  Taoist Priestess Song & a ghost boatgirl.
PS: There is audio hint for enemy's "surprise" attack

「桑之巫韻︰鹽海嘆聲」是一個以頭目戰為主的三維彈幕射擊遊戲﹐故事為少女道姑小桑追擊一個蜑家女鬼。
注意：敵人部份攻擊是以聲效作提示

☯ Survey 問卷調查 ☯

  • How do you feel about the 3-axis Bullet-hell battle system? Is it too hard to feel the bullet position and dodge?
  • Is the local culture element an obstacle for you to enjoy the game?
  • How do you feel about the game's learning curve?
  • Any suggestion for improvement?

There is a "Story" difficulty option in case you are not good at this kind of shooting game but really want to go through it. The game will go on even when your hp gets lower than zero.Not recommanded to use it.

☯ Story 遊戲故事 ☯

Taoist Priestess Song recieved a witness report about a ghost stealing properties from harbour. Without investigation, she drove a temple boat out to trace the thief and end up in a battle...

少女道姑小桑收到報告關於碼頭發生靈異事件，有貨物被水上的鬼魂拿走，沒有細問下駕船追查，成功找上蜑家女鬼喜蓮，隨即卷入戰鬥……

☯ Control 遊戲控制 ☯

left press 左鍵 - shoot 射擊
right press 右鍵- aim 瞄準
WASD - move 移動
space - jump (quintuple  jumps) 跳躍 (可五連跳)
shift - roll (counted as jump) 滾動 (計一次跳躍)
Q - bless shield (limited) 神佑護罩 (有限次數)
num1 - fulu spell shoot 靈符連射
num2 - bagua mirror (need charging time, can dissolve ghost boats)
            八卦鏡 (充能需時,可擊潰幽靈船)
Esc - pause 暫停

☯ Context 背景資料 ☯

Unlike my other games in the Song of Morus series, lots of real life reference of Hong Kong local culture has been added into this game. The antagonist is a Tanka, a ethnic group in Southern China who live on boat for their life. And lots of boat models are specifically created to matched this theme. I guess the most iconic one would be the Jumbo floating resturant (Thanks to Leo173173), which i used it for the second stage bossfight. The protagonist's  temple boat is also based on the only existing floating Tin Hau temple in Hong Kong (ref), but highly modified for better game experience.

跟以往桑之巫韻系列不同﹐鹽海嘆聲這遊戲我特別做了許多資料搜集以及製作獨有的立體模型﹐就為加上獨特的香港歷史文化元素。最明顯的應該是在第二段作為頭目戰船的珍寶海鮮舫(感謝Leo173173借出立體模型)﹐而主角駕駛的則是香港現時唯一的水上三角天后廟船。

☯ Future Plan 未來計劃 ☯

Currently, I would like to polish & extend the current content. Ideally, I would like the game to be ~15 minute long (one playthrough no death no skip). After that, depend on how much attention it attaches, i probably will create chapter 2 and it may include one of the Gospelboats from the Oriental Boat Mission.

暫時我計劃就著現有的內容進行完善和擴充﹐理想情況下我希望一次的遊戲時間能達到15分鐘。之後如果遊戲有迴響﹐我可能會籌備製作第二章﹐目前已有若干靈感﹐或會以東方水上基督教會的福音船為材。
